snippet.title: Pine: A Story of Loss Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Alone in the forest glade he shared with his wife, a woodworker struggles to accept her passing. Help him hold on to cherished memories of their life together as he struggles to care for himself and his now empty home. Pine is a single-serving game focused on telling a beautiful, emotional tale.

Coming to PC, Mobile and Nintendo Switch in 2024.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://bit.ly/PineSteam

LINKS

🌲Developed by Made Up Games - https://twitter.com/MadeUpGamesBK
🌲Published by Fellow Traveller - https://fellowtraveller.games

🌲Steam: https://bit.ly/PineSteam
🌲Mobile: Coming soon!
🌲Nintendo Switch: Coming soon!
